title: How to Turn Your PS Vita System On and Off

steps.headline: Hold the PS VITA system.
steps.description: The button is located next to the LEFT TRIGGER.

steps.headline: Hold the button until you see the PLAYSTATION Logo.
When you have finished using the device, hold the button down again until it shows the following message: "Would you like to power off."
steps.description: Once you see the message, press yes.

steps.headline: Also, when your touch screen gets too sensitive, keep on holding the button even if the message shows as it will automatically turn itself off.

text: Hold the PS VITA system. The button is located next to the LEFT TRIGGER. Hold the button until you see the PLAYSTATION Logo.  When you have finished using the device, hold the button down again until it shows the following message: "Would you like to power off." Once you see the message, press yes. Also, when your touch screen gets too sensitive, keep on holding the button even if the message shows as it will automatically turn itself off.
